title: The Educational Institution shall file an undertaking to abide by the cited terms and conditions before allowing utilization of 50% of additional permissible FSI beyond Zonal (basic) FSI
clause_text: The Educational Institution shall file an undertaking to abide by the cited terms and conditions before allowing utilization of 50% of additional permissible FSI beyond Zonal (basic) FSI.
section: Terms and Conditions for Educational Institution or Institutional Buildings
